relaxAndEnjoy.message:
You can now relax and enjoy watching movies as usual! We will automagically skip any unwanted scene.
On every movie, we will let you know if it is:

clean.message: Limpio: No hace falta saltar ninguna escena.

cut.message: Cut: All unwanted scenes will be skipped.

unsafe.message: Unsafe: Beware! We can't skip all unwanted scenes yet.

unknown.message: Unknown: Careful! Movie might have unwanted scenes.

noFilters.message: No filters for this film. Be the first one to add one!

clickToStartFilter.message: Click to start a new filter (Alt+N)

youToldToSkip.message: You told us to skip this

youToldNotToSkip.message: You didn't tell us to skip this

noMovie.message: Open a specific movie/show to start using Ohana. If you've already opened a movie, try refreshing the page.

h_inactive.message: You are not using Ohana to skip content

inactive.message: To automagically skip unwanted scenes, let us know

cleanMovie.message: Enjoy! This is a clean movie, there is no need to skip anything!

considerCollab.message: Please consider donating or becoming an editor to support the creation of new filters.

openValidProvider.message: To use Ohana please open one of our supported content providers:

moreOnWebsite.message: Visit Ohana Website to find out more about skipping content.
